mapper.insert: insert into payment_detail (deductcode, paycode, deductpay) values (#{deductCode},#{payCode}, nvl(#{deductPay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null))
mapper.select: select deductcode, paycode, deductpay from payment_detail

select pd.deductcode, pd.paycode, deductpay,dpd.deprostatus ,to_char(p.payday,'yyyy-MM-dd') payday from payment_detail pd, de_product_div dpd,payment p where pd.deductcode=dpd.deductcode and p.paycode=pd.paycode and pd.paycode=#{paycode}
